item.title: Chicken, Tomato and Spinach Curry
item.description: This dish is a very simple and tasty curry that can be made with minimal ingredients, but pairs amazingly with anything else one may want in a curry (i.e. ginger, lemongrass). Note: You may also need a blender / food processor. Ingredients 500g or 1lb of chicken breast Virgin olive oil (1/2 cup or ~100ml) Fresh tomatoes of any variety (10 - 15 medium sized) Two medium sized onions 250g or 1/2lbs of fresh spinach Curry powder of your favourite variety Red chilies (or red chilli paste) Any extra herbs or spices to your taste Directions Dice your onions, begin to fry in the pot at a medium-low temperature.
